summary: Defines the core representation of a Cython extension module during the compilation process, managing declaration analysis, import resolution, type hierarchy organization, and the generation of all required C/C++ source fragments such as type objects, function wrappers, and module initialization/cleanup code.
business_intent: Transforms highâ€‘level Python-like source into a compiled C/C++ extension module that can be imported by Python, delivering performance improvements and seamless integration with the Python runtime.
